channel.title: colours on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in colours on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Misty Night
item.description: On this misty night Trees are backlit mystically She cannot welcome Winter with any warmth Yet, when you are near The biting wind is forgiven

item.title: Pachai Niramae: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: The lyrics of this song uses vivid imagery of colours to describe love and the woman he is in love with. The song begins with him shouting out in joy that she smiled at him.

item.title: Spectrum of Hues
item.description: Have you ever felt completely surrounded and soaked in love as if it was the medium you lived and breathed in? I believe that the experience of such a feeling is what makes us good and loving people.
